dashboardLayout.continueUsing: Choose a plan to continue using ArgiFlow.

hero.badge: AI Automation Platform for Revenue-Driven Businesses
hero.description: 10+ specialized AI agents that discover opportunities, generate leads, send outreach, track engagement, and manage your pipeline — all on autopilot. Available for Western and African markets.

services.title: Everything You Need to
services.description: From autonomous AI agents to engagement intelligence — a complete platform for finding opportunities, engaging leads, and closing deals.
services.s0desc: Custom voice AI agents that handle inbound and outbound calls, qualify leads, answer questions, and schedule appointments 24/7 — so you never miss an opportunity.
services.s1desc: 10+ industry-specific AI agents — from Tax Lien Hunters and Govt Contract Finders to Cross-Border Trade Agents. Each agent runs autonomously with its own lifecycle: discover, analyze, enrich, act, and monitor.
services.s2desc: Visual drag-and-drop workflow builder with 30+ action types, AI-powered generation, and 6 pre-built templates. Automate lead nurture, email sequences, deal pipelines, and more.
services.s3desc: AI chatbots powered by Claude that engage visitors, answer questions, qualify leads, and book appointments — with full context of your business, website, and services.
services.s4desc: Visual Kanban-style sales pipelines to manage deals through stages. Create custom funnels, drag-and-drop deals, and track conversion rates with stage-level analytics.
services.s5desc: Multi-channel outreach via email and SMS with open/click tracking. AI scores leads based on engagement. Automated 3-step follow-ups, inbox monitoring, and smart scheduling.

platformFeatures.f0desc: Claude analyzes your business and generates a full marketing strategy on signup — automatically tailored to your industry, services, and target audience.
platformFeatures.f1desc: AI scans and analyzes your website to extract services, value propositions, pricing, FAQs, and contact info — then injects that knowledge into every AI interaction.
platformFeatures.f2desc: Send personalized emails via SendGrid and SMS via Twilio directly from the platform. AI crafts outreach messages based on your business profile and lead data.
platformFeatures.f3desc: Know exactly which leads opened your emails, clicked your links, and when. Auto-scoring classifies leads by engagement level with recommended next actions.
platformFeatures.f4desc: Pre-built workflow templates for lead nurturing, follow-ups, appointment reminders, and re-engagement campaigns. Activate, pause, and customize with one click.
platformFeatures.f5desc: Courses, tutorials, and resources to master the platform. From beginner guides to advanced AI strategy — with progress tracking and completion certificates.
platformFeatures.f6desc: Bot templates for 12+ industries, ad templates with 9x ROI blueprints, VSL funnel builders, organic client acquisition blueprints, and agency SOPs.
platformFeatures.f7desc: Real-time dashboards tracking leads, appointments, agent performance, email engagement rates, funnel conversion, and revenue attribution across all channels.

agents.title: 10+ Specialized AI Agents Ready to
agents.description: Each agent is purpose-built for a specific industry or task. Enable with one click, configure your preferences, and let them run autonomously.
agents.autonomousDesc: Each agent runs its own lifecycle — discover, analyze, enrich, act, and monitor — working 24/7 to find and close opportunities.
agents.exploreAgents: Explore all 10+ agents with detailed capabilities
agents.w0desc: Crawl county records, analyze ROI, track auctions, auto-bid
agents.w1desc: Find tax deed properties at county auctions nationwide
agents.w2desc: Off-market deals, run comps, connect with cash buyers
agents.w3desc: Scan SAM.gov, filter by NAICS, evaluate requirements
agents.w4desc: Profitable arbitrage across Amazon, eBay, Walmart
agents.a0desc: Find and auto-apply to government tenders continent-wide
agents.a1desc: Identify import/export opportunities, match trade partners
agents.a3desc: Connect diaspora with investment & service opportunities
agents.payPerResultDesc: No monthly fee. Only pay when agents deliver results.
agents.pipelineDesc: Watch how AI agents work together to find, qualify, nurture, and convert leads into paying clients — fully automated, 24/7.

platform.title: Built-in Tools to
platform.description: Every tool you need — from AI strategy generation to email tracking, training resources, and analytics — all in one dashboard.

process.title: Three Steps to
process.description: From signup to your first leads in under 5 minutes.
process.step1Title: Sign Up & Tell Us About Your Business
process.step1Desc: Create your account and tell us about your company, industry, and goals. Our AI immediately generates a customized marketing strategy and begins analyzing your website.
process.step2Desc: Browse the Agent Catalog, enable specialized agents for your industry, and configure their settings. They start finding opportunities, leads, and deals immediately.
process.step3Desc: AI agents find leads, send outreach, track engagement, and move deals through your pipeline. You focus on closing while the platform handles everything else.

pricing.title: Plans That
pricing.description: Start free, upgrade as you grow. Every plan includes the full platform.

testimonials.title: Built For.
testimonials.t0quote: The Tax Lien Hunter searches county records across 10 states, scores ROI on every property, and guides you through a 9-step purchase workflow with a 14-point due diligence checklist.
testimonials.t1quote: Auto-generates 30 real medical billing leads every 5 hours, rotating through 12 US regions with 4 targeting strategies. Leads arrive scored, with outreach drafts ready to send.
testimonials.t2quote: Manage up to 4 business profiles with separate lead lists, outreach identities, and pipelines. AI follow-ups, inbox monitoring, and engagement scoring run on autopilot.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.q0: What are AI Agents and how do they work?
faq.a0: AI Agents are specialized autonomous systems that run specific tasks for your industry — like finding tax liens, scanning government contracts, or generating leads. Each agent follows a lifecycle: discover opportunities, analyze them, enrich with data, take action (send outreach, bid), and monitor results. You configure them once and they work 24/7.
faq.a1: Sign up, configure your agents, and they start working immediately. The auto medical billing lead generator runs every 5 hours, so you can see leads quickly. For multi-system integrations, allow 2-4 weeks to fully optimize.
faq.a2: Not at all. The platform is designed for non-technical users. Browse the agent catalog, flip a switch to enable, and configure with simple settings. Our AI handles the complex parts.
faq.a3: We operate globally with two specialized brands: ArgiFlow for Western markets (US, EU, UK, Canada, Australia) and TradeFlow for African markets (Nigeria, Kenya, Ghana, South Africa, and 26+ more countries) — each with region-specific agents and pricing.
faq.q4: Can you integrate with my existing tools?
faq.a4: Yes. We integrate with CRMs (Salesforce, HubSpot), email platforms (SendGrid), SMS (Twilio), calendars, and virtually any tool with an API. All integrations are configured from your Settings dashboard.
faq.q5: What if it doesn't work for my business?
faq.a5: We offer a free Starter tier so you can explore the platform with no commitment. If you upgrade and it's not the right fit, cancel anytime with zero risk.

emailEngine.title: Enterprise-Grade Email That
emailEngine.description: Built-in Instantly-style email infrastructure with warmup, deliverability testing, unified inbox, and AI copilot. No third-party tools needed.
emailEngine.f0desc: Multi-tier warmup pools build sender reputation automatically. Premium pool for Pro users with daily ramp-up and reputation scoring.
emailEngine.f1desc: Multi-step sequences with A/Z testing, spintax, variable substitution, inbox rotation, and timezone-aware scheduling.
emailEngine.f2desc: AI auto-labels replies as interested, meeting booked, or not interested. Sentiment analysis, bulk actions, and smart filtering.
emailEngine.f3desc: Pre-send deliverability analysis scoring Gmail, Outlook, and Yahoo placement. Spam word detection and actionable recommendations.
emailEngine.f4desc: Waterfall verification with format, disposable, role-based, MX, and SMTP validation. Bulk verification with catch-all recovery.
emailEngine.f5desc: AI generates sequences, subject lines, follow-ups, and campaign ideas based on your ICP, value props, and objection handling playbook.
emailEngine.connectDesc: Google, Microsoft, or any IMAP/SMTP provider. Sync replies in the Unibox automatically.
emailEngine.dfyDesc: We set up your accounts, configure DNS records, and add you to the premium warmup pool.

workflowEngine.title: Visual Automations That
workflowEngine.description: An n8n-style drag-and-drop workflow builder with 30+ action types, 6 pre-built templates, and AI-powered workflow generation.
workflowEngine.step2Desc: Claude reads your company profile & strategy
workflowEngine.step3Desc: AI fills in email copy, scoring criteria, timing
workflowEngine.step4Desc: Your workflow runs with real-time execution logs
workflowEngine.f0desc: Build complex automations visually with nodes for AI actions, CRM operations, email, SMS, voice calls, webhooks, delays, and conditions.
workflowEngine.f1desc: AI classify, score, and generate content. CRM CRUD operations. Email, SMS, and voice actions. Webhooks, delays, A/B splits, and conditional logic.
workflowEngine.f2desc: Lead Capture Nurture, Email Engagement Escalation, Appointment Onboarding, Deal Won Pipeline, AI Content Pipeline, and Review Request.
workflowEngine.f3desc: Select a template, click AI Generate, and Claude customizes every node based on your company profile, strategy, and business lines.
workflowEngine.f4desc: Trigger on lead created, status changed, email opened/clicked, appointment booked/completed, voice call completed, and more.
workflowEngine.f5desc: Track every workflow execution with step-by-step logs, success/failure rates, and performance metrics in real-time.

revenueSuite.title: Close Deals on
revenueSuite.description: Voice AI, automated follow-ups, inbox monitoring, and outreach scheduling work together as your 24/7 revenue machine.
revenueSuite.f0desc: AI-powered phone calls via Twilio. Conversational AI qualifies leads, answers questions, and books appointments. Full call transcripts and recordings.
revenueSuite.f1desc: When outreach is sent, leads are auto-enrolled in a follow-up sequence: Day 3 check-in, Day 5 value reminder, Day 7 final nudge. AI-generated with escalating urgency.
revenueSuite.f2desc: Background job checks your inbox every 2 minutes. When a lead replies, AI generates a contextual response, sends it, and updates lead status automatically.
revenueSuite.f3desc: Schedule emails for optimal send times. Background jobs process due emails every 60 seconds. Cancel or reschedule anytime from the lead card.
revenueSuite.f4desc: Follow-up sequences auto-stop when a lead books an appointment or engagement score hits 60+. Pause and resume per lead with one click.
revenueSuite.f5desc: Manage up to 4 separate business profiles, each with its own filtered leads, outreach identity, and pipeline. Perfect for agencies and consultants.

leadDiscovery.title: AI Finds Opportunities
leadDiscovery.description: County-level tax lien discovery with ROI scoring and automatic medical billing lead generation — finding real opportunities, not generic lists.
leadDiscovery.medBillingDesc: 30 real leads every 5 hours, rotating 12 US regions
leadDiscovery.f0desc: Search specific counties across 10 tax lien states. Claude AI crawls county tax collector websites to find real delinquent property data.
leadDiscovery.f1desc: Every property gets ROI scoring based on state interest rates (9-24%), redemption periods, and property type. Risk analysis included.
leadDiscovery.f2desc: Guided workflow: verify data, check title, register for auction, submit bid, track redemption period, and manage the full lifecycle.
leadDiscovery.f3desc: Background job generates 30 real medical billing leads every 5 hours. Rotates through 12 US regions with different targeting strategies.
leadDiscovery.f4desc: Automated checklist covering title search, environmental check, property inspection, lien priority, tax history, and 9 more critical items.
leadDiscovery.f5desc: Auto-rotates through regions and strategies: hiring signals, new practices, pain points, and specialty targeting for maximum coverage.

cta.description: Sign up free, browse the agent catalog, and deploy your first AI agent in under 5 minutes. Let autonomous AI find opportunities, engage leads, and grow your revenue.
cta.trialNote: Free plan available. No commitment. Upgrade anytime.

training.title: Training Center
training.subtitle: Level up your skills and get the most out of ArgiFlow.
training.masterPlatformDesc: Courses and tutorials to help you get the most out of every AI feature.
training.course1Desc: Learn the basics of setting up your account and configuring your first AI agents.
training.course2Desc: Master advanced lead generation techniques using AI-powered prospecting tools.
training.course3Desc: Create high-converting email and SMS campaigns with AI-generated copy.
training.course4Desc: Deep dive into configuring and optimizing your AI agents for maximum performance.
training.course5Desc: Set up intelligent lead scoring models to prioritize your hottest prospects.
training.course6Desc: Understand your metrics and create custom reports for data-driven decisions.
training.c1l1Content:
Welcome to ArgiFlow! In this lesson, you'll learn how to set up your account.

1. Visit the signup page and enter your business email
2. Complete the two-step registration (account details + business profile)
3. Verify your email address via the confirmation link
4. Log in to access your dashboard

Once logged in, you'll see the main dashboard with an overview of all platform features.
training.c1l2Content:
Your dashboard is the command center for all AI automation activities.

Key sections in the sidebar:
- Overview: Business metrics and activity summary
- Leads & CRM: Manage all your prospects and contacts
- Sales Funnels: Track deals through pipeline stages
- AI Agents: Configure and deploy specialized AI agents
- Email Infrastructure: Set up email accounts and campaigns
- Workflows: Build visual automation sequences

Tip: The notification bell in the top-right shows real-time alerts from your AI agents.
training.c1l3Content:
A complete company profile helps the AI generate better strategies and outreach.

Go to Settings and fill in:
- Company name and industry
- Website URL (for AI website training)
- Business description (be detailed — the AI uses this)
- Your job title and role

The more context you provide, the more personalized your AI agents and marketing strategies will be.
training.c1l4Content:
ArgiFlow offers 10 specialized AI agents, each designed for a specific business task:

Western Market Agents:
- Tax Lien Hunter: Finds delinquent property tax opportunities
- Tax Deed Agent: Discovers properties at county auctions
- Wholesale RE Agent: Finds off-market real estate deals
- Govt Contracts Agent: Scans federal procurement portals
- Lead Gen Agent: AI-powered lead prospecting
- Arbitrage Agent: Finds e-commerce price gaps

African Market Agents:
- Govt Tender Agent, Cross-Border Trade, Agri Market, Diaspora Services

Each agent can be configured with custom parameters and runs automatically.
training.c1l5Content:
Let's generate your first AI marketing strategy!

1. Go to the Marketing Strategy page
2. Fill in your company details if not already done
3. Click "Generate My AI Strategy"
4. Wait while Claude AI analyzes your business and creates a custom plan

The strategy includes:
- Target audience analysis
- Channel recommendations
- Content strategy
- Campaign ideas
- KPIs to track

You can regenerate the strategy anytime as your business evolves.
training.c2l1Content:
ArgiFlow provides multiple lead generation channels:

- AI Agent Discovery: Automated lead finding by specialized agents
- Auto Medical Billing: Background job generates 30 real leads every 5 hours
- Manual Entry: Add leads directly to your CRM
- Import: Bulk import from CSV files
- Chatbot: Capture leads from your website

All leads are automatically scored and can be assigned to business profiles.
training.c2l2Content:
To configure a lead generation agent:

1. Go to Agent Catalog
2. Select the agent type (e.g., Tax Lien Hunter, Lead Gen Agent)
3. Click Configure and set your parameters
4. Enable the agent and it starts working automatically

For Tax Lien Hunter, you can set:
- Target states and counties
- Property types and lien amount ranges
- Interest rate minimums
- Bid strategy (conservative/moderate/aggressive)
training.c2l3Content:
Every lead gets an AI-powered score from 0-100:

- 0-30: Cold lead — needs nurturing
- 31-60: Warm lead — showing interest
- 61-80: Hot lead — ready to engage
- 81-100: Priority lead — immediate action needed

Scores update automatically based on:
- Email opens and clicks
- Reply activity
- Website visits
- Engagement patterns
training.c2l4Content:
The Leads & CRM page is your central hub for managing prospects.

Key features:
- Filter leads by status, score, business profile, or search
- View detailed lead cards with contact info and engagement history
- Send outreach directly from lead cards
- Schedule future sends with the date/time picker
- View AI-generated conversation threads
- Track follow-up sequences and pause/resume them
training.c2l5Content:
You can manage up to 4 separate business profiles, each with its own filtered leads list.

To create a business profile:
1. Go to Leads & CRM
2. Click on Business Profiles
3. Add a new profile with name and description
4. Assign leads to specific businesses

This is perfect for agencies managing multiple clients or businesses with different service lines.
training.c2l6Content:
AI-generated outreach drafts are created automatically for each lead.

The AI considers:
- Your company profile and services
- The lead's industry and role
- Best practices for cold outreach
- Personalization based on available data

You can edit drafts before sending, or send them directly. Each outreach email includes tracking for opens and clicks.
training.c2l7Content:
You can schedule outreach for optimal send times:

1. Open a lead card
2. Click the Schedule button
3. Pick a date and time
4. Confirm — the email will be sent automatically

A background job processes scheduled emails every 60 seconds. You can cancel scheduled sends anytime before they go out.
training.c2l8Content:
When outreach is sent, leads are automatically enrolled in a 3-step follow-up sequence:

- Day 3: Friendly check-in
- Day 5: Value reminder with relevant information
- Day 7: Final nudge with urgency

The sequence stops when:
- The lead books an appointment
- Engagement score reaches 60+
- All 3 steps are completed

You can pause and resume follow-ups per lead from the lead card.
training.c3l1Content:
The Email Infrastructure page is your email command center.

First, connect your email accounts:
- Google (Gmail/G-Suite)
- Microsoft (Office 365/Outlook)
- Any IMAP/SMTP provider

Each account gets health monitoring, DNS validation, and daily send limits. You can connect multiple accounts for inbox rotation.
training.c3l2Content:
New email accounts need warming up before high-volume sending.

The warmup engine:
- Gradually increases daily send volume
- Creates realistic email conversations
- Builds sender reputation over time
- Monitors deliverability scores

Two warmup pools available:
- Standard: Basic warmup for new accounts
- Premium (Pro): Enhanced warmup with priority placement
training.c3l3Content:
Create multi-step email sequences:

1. Go to Email Infrastructure → Campaigns tab
2. Click Create Campaign
3. Add email steps with subject lines and body content
4. Configure timing between steps
5. Add A/Z test variations for subject lines
6. Set send windows and daily limits
7. Launch your campaign

Features include spintax, variable substitution ({{firstName}}, {{companyName}}), and inbox rotation across multiple accounts.
training.c3l4Content:
Send SMS messages to leads via Twilio integration:

1. Go to the campaign builder
2. Select SMS as the channel
3. Write your message (keep it under 160 characters for best results)
4. Select target leads
5. Send or schedule

SMS is great for time-sensitive messages like appointment reminders, follow-ups, and quick check-ins.
training.c3l5Content:
The Unibox aggregates all incoming emails in one place.

AI auto-labeling categorizes messages:
- Interested
- Not Interested
- Out of Office
- Meeting Booked
- Referral
- Question
- Wrong Person
- Bounced

You can star, archive, and bulk-action messages. Sentiment analysis helps you prioritize responses.
training.c3l6Content:
Before sending campaigns, test your deliverability:

1. Go to Inbox Test tab
2. Enter your email content
3. Run the placement test

The test analyzes:
- Gmail, Outlook, and Yahoo placement predictions
- Spam word detection
- Link and image analysis
- Email length and formatting
- Actionable recommendations to improve delivery rates
training.c4l1Content:
The Agent Catalog shows all 10 available AI agents.

Each agent card displays:
- Agent name and description
- Category (Real Estate, Government, Services, etc.)
- Configuration status
- Run history and health score

Agents are divided by region:
- Western: Tax Lien, Tax Deed, Wholesale RE, Govt Contracts, Lead Gen, Arbitrage
- African: Govt Tender, Cross-Border Trade, Agri Market, Diaspora
training.c4l2Content:
The Tax Lien Hunter is your most powerful property agent.

Configuration options:
- Target States: FL, AZ, IN, NJ, IL, MD, SC, CO, IA, WV
- Target Counties: Specific county-level targeting
- Property Types: Residential, commercial, vacant land
- Lien Amount Range: $500 - $15,000
- Interest Rate Minimum: 8%+
- Bid Strategy: Conservative, moderate, or aggressive

The agent searches county tax collector websites using Claude AI's web search capability.
training.c4l3Content:
You can customize any agent with a custom script that defines:

- Research workflow and steps
- Data sources to check
- Output format and fields
- Search rules and validation

The script is sent to Claude AI as instructions when the agent runs. This gives you full control over how the agent searches, what data it collects, and how results are formatted.
training.c4l4Content:
Track every agent run:

- Last run timestamp
- Next scheduled run
- Total leads found
- Health score (0-100)
- Error logs if any issues occurred

Agents that consistently find leads maintain high health scores. If an agent encounters errors, its health score decreases to alert you.
training.c4l5Content:
When an agent finds leads, they're automatically added to a matching sales funnel.

Each agent type has its own pipeline with industry-specific stages:

Example — Tax Lien Pipeline:
1. Discovered
2. Analyzing ROI
3. Due Diligence
4. Bidding
5. Won/Acquired

The funnel is auto-created on first run if it doesn't exist.
training.c4l6Content:
Make AI-powered phone calls to leads:

1. Go to Voice AI page
2. Select a lead to call
3. The system initiates a call via Twilio
4. Claude AI handles the conversation
5. Full transcript and recording are saved

You can also initiate calls directly from lead cards. The AI qualifies leads, answers questions, and can book appointments.
training.c4l7Content:
A background job automatically generates medical billing leads:

- Runs every 5 hours
- Finds 30 real leads per batch
- Rotates through 12 US regions
- Uses 4 targeting strategies: hiring signals, new practices, pain points, specialty targeting

Leads are added to CRM with scores, outreach drafts, and funnel assignments. You can trigger manual runs from the Agent Catalog page.
training.c4l8Content:
Train your AI agents on your website content:

1. Go to Settings → Website Training
2. Enter your website URL
3. Click Analyze
4. The AI crawls your site and extracts business knowledge

This information is used to:
- Personalize outreach emails
- Improve agent responses
- Generate better marketing strategies
- Create more relevant conversation scripts
training.c4l9Content:
Monitor your agents' performance:

- Health Score: 0-100 rating based on success rate
- Run Frequency: How often the agent runs
- Leads Found: Total leads discovered
- Error Rate: Recent failures and issues

Best practices:
- Check agent health weekly
- Review and adjust settings if scores drop
- Ensure API keys are current
- Monitor rate limits
training.c4l10Content:
Power user tips for agent configuration:

- Use specific county targeting for Tax Lien Hunter instead of full states
- Set conservative bid strategies initially, then adjust based on results
- Customize agent scripts for your specific niche
- Use the AI chat integration to manually run agents with specific parameters
- Set up workflow automations to process agent results automatically
- Monitor the auto-lead-gen status page for batch run analytics
training.c5l1Content:
Lead scores help you prioritize your time and effort.

Score Components:
- Profile completeness (name, email, phone, company)
- Engagement activity (opens, clicks, replies)
- Source quality (agent-found vs manual entry)
- Recency of interaction

Scores range from 0-100:
- 0-30: Cold — needs nurturing content
- 31-60: Warm — engage with personalized outreach
- 61-80: Hot — ready for direct contact
- 81-100: Priority — call immediately
training.c5l2Content:
ArgiFlow tracks every interaction with your leads:

- Email Opens: Tracked via pixel
- Link Clicks: Tracked via redirect URLs
- Replies: Detected by inbox monitor
- Appointments: Booked through your scheduling link
- Voice Calls: Logged with full transcripts

Engagement data flows into the lead score automatically, so your hottest prospects always bubble to the top.
training.c5l3Content:
The auto follow-up system has smart pause logic:

Stops automatically when:
- Lead books an appointment (goal achieved)
- Engagement score reaches 60+ (they're engaged)
- All 3 follow-up steps complete (sequence done)
- You manually pause the sequence

This prevents over-contacting engaged leads while ensuring cold leads get proper nurturing.
training.c5l4Content:
Track leads through their lifecycle:

Status options:
- New: Just added to CRM
- Contacted: Outreach has been sent
- Engaged: Lead has interacted (opened/clicked/replied)
- Qualified: Meets your criteria for follow-up
- Converted: Became a customer
- Lost: Not interested or unresponsive

Statuses update automatically based on engagement, or you can set them manually.
training.c5l5Content:
Best practices for lead qualification:

1. Set up your ideal customer profile (ICP) in company settings
2. Use lead scores to prioritize — focus on 60+ scores first
3. Review AI-generated engagement analysis on each lead card
4. Check conversation threads for buying signals
5. Use Voice AI to quickly qualify high-score leads
6. Move qualified leads to sales funnels for deal tracking

The AI copilot can help you identify patterns in your best-converting leads.
training.c6l1Content:
Your dashboard shows key business metrics at a glance:

- Total Leads: All leads in your CRM
- Active Leads: Leads with recent engagement
- Appointments Booked: Scheduled meetings
- Conversion Rate: Leads that became customers
- Revenue: Total deal value

Metrics update in real-time as your AI agents work and leads engage with your outreach.
training.c6l2Content:
Track email campaign performance:

- Open Rate: Percentage of recipients who opened
- Reply Rate: Percentage who responded
- Bounce Rate: Undeliverable emails
- Click Rate: Link engagement

View per-campaign daily metrics and status breakdowns. Use A/Z testing results to optimize future campaigns.
training.c6l3Content:
Monitor how your AI agents are performing:

- Leads found per run
- Success rate over time
- Health score trends
- Error frequency and types
- Best-performing agent configurations

Use the auto-lead-gen status page for detailed batch run history with region and strategy breakdowns.
training.c6l4Content:
Sales funnel analytics show deal progression:

- Deals per stage
- Average time in each stage
- Stage conversion rates
- Total pipeline value
- Won vs lost ratio

The Kanban board view makes it easy to drag deals between stages and spot bottlenecks in your pipeline.
training.c6l5Content:
Monitor your email health:

- Inbox placement rate (target: 95%+)
- Spam rate (target: < 0.1%)
- Warmup progress per account
- DNS health (SPF/DKIM/DMARC status)
- Daily send volume vs limits

Use inbox placement testing before major campaigns to catch issues early.
training.c6l6Content:
Track engagement patterns over time:

- Best days/times for email opens
- Most effective subject line patterns
- Reply rate by outreach type
- Follow-up step effectiveness
- Voice call connection rates

Use these insights to optimize your outreach timing and messaging strategy.
training.c6l7Content:
Export your data for further analysis:

- Lead lists with all fields and scores
- Campaign performance reports
- Agent run history
- Deal pipeline snapshots

All exports include timestamps and can be filtered by date range, status, or business profile. Use these reports for team reviews and strategy planning.

strategy.title: Marketing Strategy

resources.title: Resources
resources.subtitle: Battle-tested templates, proven ads, funnels, and SOPs to scale your agency.
resources.resourceLibraryDesc: Bot templates, ad blueprints, funnel builders, and SOPs — everything you need to succeed.
resources.botTemplatesDesc: {{count}} proven bot templates. Each one handled thousands of real conversations. Pick a template, install in 15 minutes, and start delivering results.
resources.agentCreatedActive: AI agent created and active — View it in <1>AI Agents</1> to manage settings.
resources.installationFailedDesc: Something went wrong. Please try again.
resources.scriptGeneratedDesc: AI script generated and agent activated. View it in AI Agents.
resources.scriptProcessingDesc: Agent activated. Script generation is processing — check AI Agents shortly.
resources.adTemplatesDesc: Facebook ads that generated $450K from $50K spend. Copy and paste our winning creatives.
resources.adCopiedDesc: Full ad copy and hook are in your clipboard. Paste into your Facebook/Instagram ad manager.
resources.copiedToClipboardAd: Copied to clipboard — Paste into your ad manager to launch this campaign.
resources.funnelsDesc: Complete funnels that close clients automatically. Every page, script, and email ready to import. Swap logos, launch.
resources.funnelImportedDesc: Go to Sales Funnels to customize your {{pages}}-page funnel and launch it.
resources.importedGoTo: Imported — Go to <1>Sales Funnels</1> to customize pages and launch.
resources.blueprintDesc: Land $5K clients with $0 ad spend. The same outreach methods that landed corporate clients cold. Follow this 10-day playbook to sign your first client without spending a dollar on ads.
resources.subject: Subject:
resources.sopsDesc: Every procedure documented and recorded. Installation, sales, support, quality control, scaling, and team training. Hand any task to a VA instantly. Your agency runs like clockwork from day one.
resources.sopsAccessed: SOPs accessed — Follow each checklist step-by-step for best results.
resources.sopAccessedDesc: {{count}} procedures ready. Follow each checklist step-by-step for best results.
resources.botRealEstateDesc: Qualifies buyers/sellers, schedules showings, handles objections. Pre-loaded with MLS integration scripts.
resources.botDentalDesc: Books appointments, handles insurance questions, sends reminders. HIPAA-compliant conversation flows.
resources.botLegalDesc: Screens potential cases, collects intake info, schedules consultations. Built for PI, family, and criminal law.
resources.botAutoDesc: Handles inventory questions, schedules test drives, captures trade-in info. Works with any DMS.
resources.botFitnessDesc: Books classes, handles membership questions, promotes personal training packages. Integrates with scheduling.
resources.botHomeServicesDesc: Captures service requests, dispatches techs, handles emergency calls. Priority routing for urgent issues.
resources.botRestaurantDesc: Takes reservations, handles catering inquiries, manages waitlists. Multi-location support built in.
resources.botEducationDesc: Handles enrollment questions, schedules campus tours, processes applications. Perfect for schools and tutoring.
resources.botInsuranceDesc: Collects quote info, compares policies, books consultations. Works for auto, home, life, and commercial.
resources.botWellnessDesc: Books treatments, handles consultation requests, promotes packages. Built for med spas and aesthetic clinics.
resources.botMedBillingDesc: Handles patient billing inquiries, payment plans, insurance claim status, and collections follow-up. Reduces AR days and improves cash flow.
resources.botRevCycleDesc: End-to-end RCM automation: eligibility checks, prior authorizations, denial management, and patient statement follow-up. Built for healthcare practices and billing companies.
resources.botTaxLienDesc: Discovers tax lien properties, analyzes ROI, monitors auctions, and manages your lien portfolio automatically. Crawls county databases across 10+ states with AI-powered deal scoring.
resources.botTaxDeedDesc: Finds tax deed properties before auction, evaluates title risk, estimates after-repair value, and tracks redemption periods. Built for investors seeking full property ownership.
resources.botWholesaleDesc: Finds off-market wholesale deals, analyzes comps, generates contracts, and matches properties to your buyer list. Automates the entire wholesale pipeline from lead to assignment.
resources.botGovtDesc: Monitors SAM.gov, GovWin, and agency portals for contract opportunities matching your NAICS codes. Analyzes RFPs, tracks deadlines, and scores win probability.
resources.botArbitrageDesc: Scans retail and wholesale sources for profitable arbitrage opportunities. Tracks price differentials, calculates ROI after fees, and monitors inventory availability in real-time.
resources.botLeadGenDesc: Multi-channel lead generation across web directories, social media, and intent data sources. Enriches contacts, scores leads by buying signals, and auto-drafts personalized outreach.
resources.blueprintStep1Desc: Pick 2-3 industries from the bot templates. These have proven demand. Focus where businesses answer phones daily.
resources.blueprintStep2Desc: Use Google Maps, Yelp, and industry directories. Find businesses with bad reviews about phone service. These are warm leads.
resources.blueprintStep3Desc: Use the 1-Click Demo Builder for each prospect. Takes 3 minutes per demo. They see their business with AI already working.
resources.blueprintStep4Desc: Use the proven email/DM templates below. Include the personalized demo link. Follow up 3 times over 7 days.
resources.blueprintStep5Desc: Use the SPIN framework: Situation, Problem, Implication, Need-payoff. Let the prospect talk 80% of the time.
resources.blueprintStep6Desc: Use the 15-Minute Installation Checklist. Charge $5,000 setup + $997/month. Install same day. Start ROI immediately.
resources.outreach1Name: Cold Email #1 - The Missed Call Approach
resources.outreach1Subject: Quick question about [Business Name]'s phone system
resources.outreach1Preview: I called [Business Name] at [time] yesterday and got voicemail. I'm guessing I'm not the only one...
resources.outreach2Subject: [Business Name] is losing ~$X/month from missed calls
resources.outreach2Preview: The average [industry] business misses 32% of inbound calls. At your average ticket of $X...
resources.outreach3Preview: Hey [Name], I built something for [Business Name] - an AI that answers your phones 24/7. Here's a 60-second demo with your actual business name...
resources.outreach4Subject: How [Similar Business] added $14K/mo from missed calls
resources.outreach4Preview: [Similar Business] was missing 28% of their calls. We set up AI voice for them in 15 minutes...

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: This is your control center. Update your business info, connect external services, and turn features on or off. Each section below explains what it does and how it helps your business.
settings.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
settings.companyProfileDesc: Tell ArgiFlow about your business so the AI can create strategies and bot scripts tailored specifically to your industry and services.
settings.businessInfoDesc: This info powers your AI marketing strategy, customizes your bot scripts, and helps the AI chat assistant understand your business. The more detail you add, the better results you'll get.
settings.companyDescPlaceholder: Describe your products, services, target customers, and goals. The more detail you provide, the better strategy our AI can generate...
settings.minCharsDesc: Min 10 characters. Be specific for a better AI strategy.
settings.companyProfileSavedDesc: Your business information has been updated.
settings.failedToSaveDesc: Please check all fields and try again.
settings.missingInfoDesc: Please fill in company name, industry, and description (at least 10 characters).
settings.websiteTrainingDesc: Let AI read your website and learn about your services, pricing, and target audience. This knowledge is used to configure your AI agents so they can represent your business accurately and generate leads.
settings.trainingInProgressDesc: AI is currently reading and analyzing your website. This usually takes 30-60 seconds...
settings.trainingFailedDefault: Training failed. Please check your website URL and try again.
settings.clickToAnalyze: Click the button below to have AI analyze your website and learn about your business.
settings.noWebsiteUrlDesc: Please enter your website URL in the Company Profile section above first.
settings.websiteAnalysisStartedDesc: Our AI is reading your website now. This usually takes 30-60 seconds.
settings.trainingFailedDesc: Could not analyze your website. Please check the URL and try again.
settings.integrationsSectionDesc: Connect your external services here so ArgiFlow can send emails, texts, and sync data on your behalf. Each card explains what the service does — only connect the ones you need.
settings.notificationsDesc: Control how and when ArgiFlow notifies you about activity on your account.
settings.emailNotificationsDesc: When ON: You'll get email alerts whenever a new lead comes in, an appointment is booked, or a campaign finishes.
settings.smsNotificationsDesc: When ON: You'll receive text messages for time-sensitive updates like new leads and appointment confirmations. Requires Twilio integration below.
settings.appointmentRemindersDesc: When ON: Both you and your clients get automatic reminders before scheduled meetings so nobody forgets.
settings.weeklyReportDesc: When ON: Every Monday you'll receive a summary showing how many leads, appointments, and conversions happened last week.
settings.aiAutomationDesc: These controls turn on AI-powered features that work in the background to help you capture and manage leads automatically.
settings.aiAutoRespondDesc: When ON: Your AI bots will automatically reply to new leads and inquiries the moment they come in — even outside business hours.
settings.leadScoringDesc: When ON: Each lead gets an automatic quality score (1-100) based on their engagement level, helping you focus on the hottest prospects first.
settings.preferencesDesc: General account preferences for your ArgiFlow experience.
settings.darkModeDesc: When ON: Switches the platform to a darker color scheme that's easier on your eyes.
settings.twoFactorAuthDesc: When ON: Adds an extra security step when logging in to protect your account.
settings.emailSendGridDesc: Connect your SendGrid account to send outreach emails. Enter your API key and the verified sender email from your SendGrid account. Emails will be sent from your own domain.
settings.emailProviderDesc: Choose how to send outreach emails — use SendGrid API or connect your own SMTP server.
settings.grasshopperDesc: If you use Grasshopper as your business phone, enter the number here so your Voice AI agents can be linked to it for call routing and tracking.
settings.calendarLinkDesc: Paste your online booking link here (from Calendly, Cal.com, or similar). When your AI bot wants to schedule a meeting with a lead, it will share this link automatically.
settings.webhookDesc: A webhook sends your lead and appointment data to other tools you use — like Zapier, Make, or your own CRM system. If you don't use these tools, you can skip this one.
settings.aiApiKeyDesc: Add your own Anthropic API key to power AI features like chat, lead generation, content creation, and voice AI. Each user needs their own key for full isolation.
settings.aiApiKeyHint: Get your key from console.anthropic.com. Keys start with sk-ant-.
settings.autoLeadGenDesc: When enabled, the system will automatically search for and generate leads for your business every 5 hours using your AI key.

demoBuilder.title: Demos & Install
demoBuilder.subtitle: Generate personalized demos for prospects and install AI for clients in minutes.
demoBuilder.noDemoDesc: Create your first demo to showcase your product.
demoBuilder.voiceDemoDesc: Generate personalized voice demos for prospects instantly. They hear exactly how their AI receptionist will sound with their business name. One click creates an instant wow factor that closes deals.
demoBuilder.voicePreviewText: "Thank you for calling {{name}}. How can I help you today?"
demoBuilder.linkCopiedDesc: Share this link with your prospect.
demoBuilder.voiceDemoReadyDesc: Voice demo for {{name}} is ready to share.
demoBuilder.missingFieldsDesc: Please fill in all required fields.
demoBuilder.aiDemoDesc: Creates personalized demos with the prospect's business in 3 minutes. They watch their business with AI already working. See exact savings. Book themselves. No calls needed. The demo closes them.
demoBuilder.painPointsPlaceholder: e.g. Missing calls, slow response time

demoBuilder.feature2: Automatically qualifies leads and books appointments
demoBuilder.feature3: Personalized greetings using business name and services
demoBuilder.feature4: After-hours handling with smart voicemail and callbacks
demoBuilder.feature5: Real-time analytics dashboard with call recordings
demoBuilder.aiLinkCopiedDesc: Share this personalized demo with your prospect.
demoBuilder.missingFieldsAiDesc: Please fill in business name and industry.
demoBuilder.checklistDesc: The checklist that turns 5-hour custom jobs into 15-minute profits. Login, paste, connect, test, deliver, get paid. Refined over 500+ installations.
demoBuilder.checkItem1Desc: Access your client's workspace and navigate to Voice AI.
demoBuilder.checkItem2: Select bot template for client's industry
demoBuilder.checkItem2Desc: Choose from 10 proven templates. Each has pre-built conversation flows.
demoBuilder.checkItem3Desc: Update the welcome message, business hours, and key services offered.
demoBuilder.checkItem4Desc: Configure when AI answers live vs. takes messages for callback.
demoBuilder.checkItem5Desc: Forward existing number or provision a new local/toll-free number.
demoBuilder.checkItem6Desc: Connect Google Calendar, Calendly, or other scheduling tool.
demoBuilder.checkItem7Desc: Route leads to client's CRM automatically. Supports all major CRMs.
demoBuilder.checkItem8Desc: Configure email/SMS alerts for new leads, bookings, and urgent calls.
demoBuilder.checkItem9Desc: Test booking, inquiry, and after-hours scenarios.
demoBuilder.checkItem10Desc: Confirm leads from test calls appear in the client's CRM.
demoBuilder.checkItem11: Send client welcome email + training video
demoBuilder.checkItem11Desc: Use the pre-written template. Includes dashboard login and quick-start video.
demoBuilder.checkItem12Desc: Flag the account as live. Monitoring begins automatically.
demoBuilder.lifetimeUpdatesDesc: Every new bot, improvement, and strategy - free forever.
demoBuilder.newBotTemplatesDesc: Every new industry template added to the library, included free.
demoBuilder.aiModelUpgradesDesc: When AI models improve, your bots automatically get smarter.
demoBuilder.featureReleasesDesc: New platform features, integrations, and tools as they ship.
demoBuilder.strategyUpdatesDesc: Updated playbooks, ad templates, and SOPs based on market changes.
demoBuilder.bugFixesSecurityDesc: Continuous platform improvements and security patches.

plans.title: Choose Your Plan
plans.subtitle: Select the plan that best fits your business needs. Upgrade anytime.

plans.selectFailedDesc: Could not select the plan. Please try again.
